data.name: RPG Maker MV - The Adventurer's Journey
data.detailed_description:
Grab your sword, staff or bow and add a unique twist to your adventures!

The Adventurer's Journey Music Pack features 20 orchestrated tracks from D. C. Kairi Sawler that is sure to give your games a unique adventurous feel.

This pack contains:

  • 20 Orchestrated Tracks
  • OGG and M4A file formats for RPG Maker MV
  • The MP3 version of the tracks are included as a bonus
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG Maker MV projects

Tracklist:

Angel's Breath
Broken
Calming Dungeons
Chillcave
Crying River
Darkened Winds
Forrent
Gearworks
Giant's Hill
Grassland Adventure
Grassland Minor
Night on the Sand
Pacing Mind
River Petals
Shadows All Around
Shimmerlight Skies
Silver Sunrise
Sleepless Stars
Sorrowake
Swaysea Coast
Twinklerock Cave
Ursulian March
Warring Swords

data.short_description: Grab your sword, staff or bow and add a unique twist to your adventures!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)
